intro.p:
Consider the curve segment given by
\renewcommand{\log}{\ln} y={{ f }} defined over the interval {{a}} \leq x \leq {{b}} .
\renewcommand{\log}{\ln} x={{ g }} defined over the interval {{aa}} \leq y \leq {{bb}} .

content.p: Find an integral which computes the surface area of the solid obtained from rotating the curve segment about the x-axis.
Find an integral which computes the surface area of the solid obtained from rotating the curve segment about the y-axis.
